alert.note: Alert for Hawkins; Northwest Greene; Sullivan; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN SULLIVAN...NORTHEASTERN HAWKINS...NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON AND NORTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rogersville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Jonesborough, Surgoinsville, Colonial Heights, Gray, Church Hill, Mount Carmel, Baileyton, Leesburg, and Limestone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
